mapper.sql: id, team_id, user_id, start_time, end_time, duration, time_percent, create_id, create_by, create_time, update_id, update_by, update_time, del_status
mapper.insert:
insert into t_project_establish_team_user
id,
team_id,
user_id,

end_time,

time_percent,

mapper.update:
update t_project_establish_team_user
team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time_percent = #{timePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_status = ${@com.fea.project.enums.base.DeleteStatusEnum@NOT_DELETE.getStatus()}

update t_project_establish_team_user set team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time_percent = #{timePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_status = ${@com.fea.project.enums.base.DeleteStatusEnum@NOT_DELETE.getStatus()}
mapper.select: select u.*, pu.user_id as real_user_id from t_project_establish_team_user u inner join t_project_establish_user pu on (pu.id = u.user_id and pu.status != ${@com.fea.project.enums.user.UserStatusEnum@TYPE_DELETE.getValue()}) where u.team_id = #{teamId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

select u.*, pu.user_id as real_user_id from t_project_establish_team_user u inner join t_project_establish_user pu on (pu.id = u.user_id and pu.status != ${@com.fea.project.enums.user.UserStatusEnum@TYPE_DELETE.getValue()}) where u.team_id in ( select id from t_project_establish_team where project_id = (select project_id from t_project_establish_team where id = #{teamId, jdbcType=BIGINT}) )
mapper.update:

team_id = #{model.teamId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{model.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

end_time = #{model.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

time_percent = #{model.timePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

create_by = #{model.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{model.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_id = #{model.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_by = #{model.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{model.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_status = #{model.delStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id in

and del_status = ${@com.fea.project.enums.base.DeleteStatusEnum@NOT_DELETE.getStatus()}
